key_findings: Multiple README files serve overlapping purposes with significant content duplication
Root README.md contains outdated and contradictory information about project status
Testing documentation is scattered across multiple locations with redundant content
Claude Flow integration documentation is fragmented and duplicated
Several README files contain placeholder content or minimal information
Documentation lacks consistent structure and navigation hierarchy

readme_inventory.content_summary: Project overview, build status, known issues, setup instructions, FAQ

Inflated feature claims vs actual implementation status
80+ TypeScript errors acknowledged but setup instructions still provided
FAQ section answers questions that contradict main content

issues: Claims project is 'NOT Production Ready' but provides extensive production setup

FAQ contradicts main content about project status

Implementation guidelines may not reflect current project structure

Provide honest assessment of current build status
Simplify setup instructions or clearly mark as non-functional
Align FAQ content with main project status
